# Lawful Guarding
## Overview
**Lawful Guarding:** When creating this augmentation, choose one face of the wall. Any lawful character on the chosen side of the wall (or standing atop the wall) gains a +4 deflection bonus to AC and a +4 resistance bonus on saves. They also gain spell resistance 25 against chaotic spells and spells cast by chaotic creatures. Furthermore, they are protected from possession and mental influence as per *[[Protection From Chaos (Spell)|protection from chaos]]*.

*Caster Level:* 15th; *Prerequisites:* [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Shield of Law (Spell)|shield of law]]; Market Price:* 50,000 gp.
